node.plaintext:
In this video I discuss a quote from Andy Grove's 1999 book, "Only The Paranoid
Survive." I think it can help shift your leadership and management perspective
regarding the future of your organization. 

If you don't have time to watch a video, here are the steps of the exercise I
discuss:

 * Step One: Imagine you get fired and someone else takes your job
 * Step Two: Ask yourself, "What changes do you think they should make?"
 * Step Three: Consider, "Why shouldn't you walk out the door, come back in, and
   make those changes yourself?"
 * Step Four: Make the changes.

I hope it helps as you consider the future of your organization post quarantine.

David
node.html:
In this video I discuss a quote from Andy Grove's 1999 book, "Only The Paranoid Survive." I think it can help shift your leadership and management perspective regarding the future of your organization.

If you don't have time to watch a video, here are the steps of the exercise I discuss:

  • Step One: Imagine you get fired and someone else takes your job
  • Step Two: Ask yourself, "What changes do you think they should make?"
  • Step Three: Consider, "Why shouldn't you walk out the door, come back in, and make those changes yourself?"
  • Step Four: Make the changes.

I hope it helps as you consider the future of your organization post quarantine.

David
